alert.note: Alert for Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 4:17PM EDT until April 25 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Erie County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Albion, or 11 miles east of Conneaut, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Erie, Corry, Edinboro, Union City, Girard, Waterford, Albion, Wattsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Cranesville, Platea, Mill Village and McKean. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
